name: Seth Abramson
bio: Seth Abramson is the author of six books of poetry, including The Suburban Ecstasies (Ghost Road Press, 2009), Northerners (New Issues, 2011), and, most recently, Golden Age (BlazeVOX Books, 2017). He is a founding series co-editor of the annual anthology, Best American Experimental Writing (Wesleyan University Press). In 2008 he was awarded the J. Howard and Barbara M.J. Wood Prize by Poetry. A former public defender, he is currently an Assistant Professor of English at The University of New Hampshire.
